title: The July 2022 Marketing Digest | Similarweb
description: From keyword gap analysis to integrated search strategy, don't miss your one-minute monthly update of what’s new in the world of digital marketing.
content: HomeBlogMarketingMarketing StrategyThe Similarweb Marketing Digest: July 2022 Marketing Intelligence The Similarweb Marketing Digest: July 2022 Get a personalized demo by Chloe Dougherty , Email Marketing Specialist 2 Min. July 31, 2022 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Welcome to our latest marketing digest… it’s your one-minute monthly update of what’s new in the world of digital marketing. New features to boost your SEO + PPC Great news: We just dropped 6 scorching hot new features so you can amp up your SEO and paid search campaigns. From user intent detection to comparative keyword analysis tool – your new search superpowers await. Find out more → Podcast: 9 ways the SERPs are changing How are SEO best practices impacted by Google’s SERP update? Similarweb SEO guru, Gerald Murphy shared Nine Ways the Google SERPs are Changing and tips for keeping your rankings despite high SERP volatility up on The In Search SEO Podcast. Check it out → Why and How to Do Keyword Gap Analysis Spot holes in your client’s search strategy and find the right keywords to fill them with this detailed breakdown of keyword gap analysis. Read the blog and walk away with our top tips for using digital marketing intelligence to close in on keywords that send traffic to the competition and pinpoint the right keywords to optimize your content. Webinar: Build an integrated search strategy Search behavior is no longer limited to a single space. So, how can you build a unified keyword strategy across Google, Amazon, and YouTube? Check out this webinar to see how consumers interact with each search engine and what type of content resonates most effectively with different audiences. Watch now → Pump up your rankings with keyword clusters And last but definitely not least – find out how you can optimize your content for search clusters to rank for more keywords. Learn everything from what keyword clusters are to how your audience can benefit from this informative blog. That’s it for now – see you next month, and until then, take care! Your Marketing Secret Weapon Secure a competitive edge with actionable insights from Similarweb Book a live demo by Chloe Dougherty Email Marketing Specialist Chloe specializes in email and content marketing. She enjoys podcasts, reading short stories, and baking, and lives in Tel Aviv with her cat.
